A Smart Travel Companion: Create a suitcase that doubles as a smart travel companion, equipped with features like a built-in scale, temperature and humidity sensor, and a GPS tracker. This suitcase can also have a built-in charging station for your devices, ensuring that your phone or laptop stays charged during your travels.

A Modular Suitcase: Design a modular suitcase that can be easily customized to fit your travel needs. The suitcase can have interchangeable modules for different types of travel, such as a separate module for business trips with a built-in laptop sleeve, or a module for a family vacation with a built-in cooler and storage for toys.

A Suitcase with a Built-in Water Bottle: Create a suitcase with a built-in water bottle that can be easily accessed and refilled at any water fountain or refill station. This suitcase can also have a built-in filter that can purify water from any source, making it safe to drink.

A Suitcase with a Built-in Power Bank: Design a suitcase with a built-in power bank that can charge your devices on the go. This suitcase can have multiple USB ports and a built-in solar panel to charge your devices, ensuring that you never run out of power during your travels.

A Suitcase that Transforms into a Carry-On: Create a suitcase that can transform into a carry-on bag with the touch of a button. This suitcase can have a detachable handle and wheels, making it easy to transport and maneuver through airports. When you reach your destination, you can simply detach the handle and wheels and use the suitcase as a standard-sized carry-on bag.
